law.catch_line: Schedule of quarterly allotments of appropriations.
law.text: By June 1 of the preceding fiscal year, each branch of government shall submit to the Finance and Administration Cabinet a schedule of quarterly allotments of appropriations for each budget unit of the branch for the next fiscal year. Allotments shall conform with the appropriations in the enacted branch budget bills or other appropriation provisions.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 12, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 26, effective July 1, 1983.
